artist: maker: Mrs. Frank Day; maker: Maggie Bedausky Sam; maker: Ole Sam
creditline: Bequest from the Karen Daniels Petersen American Indian Collection
description: clusters of reeds bundled together and sewn with pink yarn; wood supports on short sides; long, curved rib bone needle attached to one corner with twisted fiber
medium: Cattail leaves, yarn, plant fibers, wood, deer rib bone
title: Mat with Needle
